on the judging panel of the pop star search show when it heads Stateside after impressing on the UK version, but producers are unconvinced and believe American audiences may prefer a more recognisable star such as Derek Hough said: Everyone thinks Cheryl Cole has the judging job on US' X Factor' in the bag.`` The truth is, nothing has been signed and the producers still aren't convinced.`` They are more keen to get a big US star like Katy or Rihanna on the panel- someone who will bring credibility to the show and who is already popular in the US.
